name: Kartana GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Slice Off
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard a Special Energy from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gale Blade
attacks.effect: You may shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Blade GX
attacks.effect: Take a Prize card. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
